news_header: Trump acknowledges Russia's attack on Ukraine but continues to blame Ukraine, causing backlash from both opponents and some Republicans.
news_original_title: Jo republikaanitkin alkoivat oikoa Trumpia jyrkin sanoin – ”Putin on syöpä”
news_text: Donald Trump has acknowledged that Russia attacked Ukraine but continues to blame Ukraine for the conflict. His comments have sparked outrage among critics worldwide, including some within the Republican Party. The New York Post criticized Trump, highlighting that Russia initiated the war and that Ukraine is defending its independence. Republican Senator Thom Tillis condemned Putin, asserting that he poses a significant threat to democracy. Meanwhile, Trump has slightly shifted his stance, admitting on Fox News that Russia is the aggressor but suggesting that Ukraine should have prevented the attack.
